import'../App.css';import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignUp=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState([]);const[users,setUsers]=useState({id:"",name:"",pnumber:"",password:""});const[errorMsg,setErrorMsg]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://localhost:4000/users").then(response=>{setUser(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.log(error);});},[]);const handleAddSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();axios.post("http://localhost:4000/users",users).then(response=>{setUser([...user,response.data]);navigate("/login");//setSuccesMsg("New Bookings has been added with the book id " + response.data.id)
}).catch(error=>{setErrorMsg(error);});};const handleChange=event=>{setUsers({...users,[event.target.name]:event.target.value});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"signup",bg:"dark",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Sign Up"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleAddSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",type:"text",value:users.name,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Enter the Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"pnumber",type:"text",value:users.pnumber,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Enter the Number:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"password",type:"password",value:users.password,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Enter the Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{name:"Submit",value:"Submit",className:"btn",children:"Sign Up "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Already register?",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{style:{color:"#00ff00",textDecoration:"none"},to:"/login",children:"Login"})]})]})})]});};export default SignUp;
